caption.p: Boxplot of intraocular pressure (IOP) of right eye (OD) for each group.

Notes: The graph shows the IOP (Y) in each group (X). It is shown that group 1 had higher IOP than group 2, which had higher IOP than group 3. Group 1: control group. Group 2: patients with controlled HIV disease. Group 3: patients with uncontrolled HIV disease.
